rmsSettings.rmsSettingsSubTitle: Apply additional permission to PDF and Microsoft Office documents for enhanced protection and control.
rmsSettings.rmsSettingsSubTitleHint: Changes applied will not override any existing custom team settings.
rmsSettings.revokeAnyTimeText: Instantly revoke enhanced access at any time.
rmsSettings.preSetPeriodText: Enhanced access is only revoked once the pre-set period expires.
rmsSettings.revokeAnyTimeTooltip:
Terminating the project, any changes to the user or team access, and deleting a file will also revoke enhanced access instantly.

The user only needs to be signed in online once within a 24-hour period.
rmsSettings.msOfficeRevokeAnyTimeTooltip:
Terminating the project, any changes to the user or team access, and deleting a file will also revoke enhanced access instantly.

The user needs to be online to view the document.
rmsSettings.presetPeriodTooltip:
The pre-set period starts once a user has downloaded and opened the document with an internet connection.

The document can be viewed offline for the remainder of the pre-set period.
rmsSettings.irmProtectionTitle: MS Office Protection and Control Settings
rmsSettings.warningMessage: Modifying these settings will lock other users from editing until changes have been saved.
rmsSettings.settingTypeTooltip: Use this column to assign a setting type. The available options are: Revoke Anytime: revoke access instantly at any time Pre-set Period: set a period for when access expires Disabled: enhanced security is off
rmsSettings.visitText:
Want more information on settings?
Visit

statusDescription.active:
This status will allow external teams to enter the Project.

As part of the project activation, you will be prompted with a go-live checklist to ensure a smooth launch.
statusDescription.underPreparation:
Default status for new Projects. The objective for this status is to configure settings and content for the Project to go-live.

It will restrict all external users from accessing the Project.
statusDescription.temporaryRestriction:
The objective for this status is to set access restrictions to the Project for specific team types.

'Full access' will allow the teams to enter the Project.

'No access' will hide the Project.
statusDescription.terminationPeriod:
This status is available by request to Sterling Admins.

Request will result in closing the Project for all teams.

After 30 days of approval, the Project and all its contents, will be deleted.

confirmationDialog.content:
You are about to leave this page with unsaved changes. All changes will be lost.

How would you like to proceed?

confirmationCancelDialog.content:
Are you sure you want to discard these changes?

All changes will be lost.

activationChecklist.activationChecklistHeader: Please confirm the following items before changing the status of this Project to Active:
activationChecklist.yourProjectStatus: Project status will be changed to Active.
activationChecklist.invitationsForBiddersUsers: External users will automatically be sent invitations, if custom settings were not set.
activationChecklist.indexStructureIsReady: Index structure is ready and content is uploaded*
activationChecklist.mainDealTeamIsCreated: Internal teams are created and all users are invited*
activationChecklist.biddersTeamsAreCreated: External teams are created and all users are added*
activationChecklist.disclaimerIsAppropriate: Disclaimer settings are properly configured for the team type*
activationChecklist.grantedPermission: Permissions are properly assigned for all teams*
activationChecklist.recyleBinIsntEmptyText: If Recycle Bin is not empty when the Project is set to active, an additional fee may incur. Please select one from the options below*
activationChecklist.deleteAllFiles: Delete all files from Recycle Bin
activationChecklist.keepAllFiles: Keep all files in Recycle Bin
activationChecklist.activeSessionValidationMessage: Unable to activate Project with an active session. Please publish session and try again.
